title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames in the Control Example flash.
OB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames in the Control Example flash.
EB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction only, the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames in the Control Example should not flash.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
